DESCRIPTION: After you play a card, gain #b1 #yBeat. At the start of each turn, reset your #yBeat to #b1.
Card effects after #yOn #yBeat X will only occur if the player has exactly X #yBeats.
#yMeasures are obtained by gaining enough #yBeats. They have no effect by themselves.
Add a copy of this card to your hand with #yExhaust and #yEthereal instead of #yRepeat.
#yCued cards exhaust whenever you play another attack. #yCued cards are also equipped with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.
Whenever you gain a #yMeasure, deal damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you gain a #yMeasure, deal damage to ALL enemies.
Apply this card's effect on a creature. After you've gained X #yBeats, trigger this effect. (Excluding the #yBeat gained from this card.)
Start each combat with this card in your hand. Don't count this card towards your maximum hand size in your opening hand.
